rules.text: 重拾關注的力量。作爲私人的個體來到一起，形成公衆！
rules.hint: 我們總看到一種苦笑，總聽到一種聲音，“有什麼用呢？什麼都不會改變”。言論的無力與無助，良知的無力與無助，似乎是普遍現象。

rules.text: 色情或暴力媒體內容必須標註爲敏感或內容警告，个人资料图片和标题图片不得包含色情或暴力内容，零容忍兒童色情。
rules.hint: This includes content that is particularly provocative even if it may not show specific body parts, as well as dead bodies, bloody injuries, and other gore. Particularly obscene content may be prohibited entirely. Profile pictures and header images may not contain sexually explicit or violent media. !!!Zero tolerance for child pornography!!!

rules.text: 無任何形式的歧視（包括種族主義、性別歧視、仇視同性戀、仇視變性人、仇外心理、種姓歧視、能力歧視等）
rules.hint: No discrimination of any kind (including racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, caste, ability, etc.)

rules.text: 不得煽動暴力或宣揚暴力意識形態。
rules.hint: Calling for people or groups to be assassinated, murdered, or attacked physically is strictly prohibited. Support for violent groups or events is prohibited.

rules.text: 不得骚扰、回避封禁、诽谤或攻击他人，禁止张贴他人的私人个人信息。
rules.hint: Repeat attempts to communicate with users who have blocked you or creation of accounts solely to harass or insult individuals is strictly prohibited. Coordinated activity to attack other users is prohibited. Posting of private personal information about others is prohibited.

rules.text: 切勿分享衆所周知的虛假和誤導性信息。
rules.hint: False and misleading information and links from low-quality sources may not be posted, especially if they are likely to mislead or confuse others or endanger their safety.

rules.text: 引用 TA 人所創造的內容時必須註明來源，並且必須主動表明是否使用了人工智能。
rules.hint: Content created by others must clearly provide a reference to the author, creator, or source. For adult content, this should include performers. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

rules.text: 這裡不歡迎商業廣告、服務推廣和搜索引擎優化消息。宣傳自己的作品除外！
rules.hint: No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotion of services, and SEO. (Promoting your own work is fine.)

rules.text: 自由傳播，自由批評，自由信，自由不信。好好說話！
rules.hint: Free to spread, free to criticize, free to believe or not to believe. Let's communicate with each other in a friendly manner!
